name: Golden Ocean Group Limited
description: Golden Ocean Group Limited is one of the world's largest publicly traded dry bulk shipping companies, focused on the transportation of dry bulk commodities such as iron ore, coal, and grains. Established in 2004 and headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda, the company operates a modern fleet of vessels, including Newcastlemax, Capesize, and Panamax ships, to meet the global demand for bulk shipping. With a strong emphasis on operational efficiency and sustainability, Golden Ocean aims to reduce its environmental footprint while providing high-quality shipping services to its clients. The company employs advanced technology and analytics to optimize fleet performance, ensuring timely deliveries and cost-effectiveness. As a significant player in the shipping industry, Golden Ocean is committed to navigating the challenges of the market, including fluctuations in commodity prices and regulatory changes, while maintaining a robust financial position. The company also focuses on strategic partnerships and long-term contracts to secure stable revenue streams, positioning itself for sustained growth in the global shipping landscape.

seo.meta_title: Golden Ocean Group | Leading Dry Bulk Shipping Company
seo.meta_description: Golden Ocean Group Limited is a premier dry bulk shipping company focused on sustainable and efficient transportation of commodities globally. Learn more about our fleet and services.

faq.question: What does Golden Ocean Group do?
faq.answer: Golden Ocean Group is a leading dry bulk shipping company that transports commodities such as iron ore and coal.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Golden Ocean Group?
faq.answer: Birgitte Ringstad Vartdal is the CEO of Golden Ocean Group Limited.

faq.question: Where is Golden Ocean Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Golden Ocean Group is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Golden Ocean operate?
faq.answer: Golden Ocean operates Capesize, Panamax, and Newcastlemax vessels.

faq.question: When was Golden Ocean Group founded?
faq.answer: Golden Ocean Group was founded in 2004.
